reviews.review_msg: Dr Ray is really good! Great lecturer in a unique subject. May seem a little aggressive but she's actually very nice & helpful. Lenient marker. Lots of extra credit opportunities. Textbooks not really needed, focus on lecture slides. Tends to end lecture early but starts tutorial early. Only problem is tutorial readings can be sometimes unclear.

Informative and interesting lectures. Lets out early for almost every class. She doesn't give out a syllabus, so you have to figure out which chapters to read, but her lectures correspond to readings fairly well. Tests were two essay questions out of four, so they were very easy to prepare for, and two in class quizzes. Lenient marker.
